name: Buddy Run
description: Grab your friends and some treats for a fun, summer picnic on Buddy Run. Buddy Run is a colourful, online platformer game where your goal is to find your scattered friends and collect food items to go on a picnic. ‘Connect’ with your friends during gameplay and move together through the colourful environment. Watch out for tricky monsters and rivers on your way to the finish line. Use the objects around you to build bridges and jump in time to avoid obstacles. Once you get to the end, you will celebrate with your cast of curious friends and have a delicious picnic.
